Zorbas hostel is located on Victoria Square, in the heart of the city's National Museum area. Cafs, restaurants, nightclubs mini markets and fast food places(24 hours open) Cinema,super market,shops and galleries,not to mention the National Archaeological Museum, are all within easy walking distance from Zorbas.
